resources.string: You have completed this many questions:

Hello and welcome to our Drivers quiz! To play, you must first press Start. A description, and four road signs will be displayed. Based on the description, you must choose the road sign that matches the description. You are given 2 tries to correctly guess each. If you are ever stuck on a question you can always press the Hint button to get a hint.At the end, your score will be displayed, and saved in our Hall Of Fame. Good Luck!
Road is not always in this condition
Road surface in certain areas may be slippery when wet
Bridge or tunnel is narrower than the approach
